confirmed_facts: Hong Kong firefighter Ho Wai Hau (ä½•å‰è±ª) died during a fire at Wang Fuk Court on 26 November 2025.
He was scheduled to marry his girlfriend the following month.
His girlfriend posted a tribute on social media describing him as her â€œsuperheroâ€ who had gone to Krypton.

timeline.event: Fire at Wang Fuk Court; Ho Wai Hau arrives first, begins search and rescue.
Ho Wai Hau loses contact with colleagues at 3:30â€¯pm; later found with severe burns.
Ho Wai Hau is transported to hospital and pronounced dead at 4:45â€¯pm.
News of his death reported by Hong Kong media; Hong Kong Fire Services website turned to blackâ€‘andâ€‘white in mourning.
Ho Wai Hauâ€™s girlfriend posts tribute on social media, referencing his impending marriage and calling him a superhero.
